org.atteo.moonshine.services

Interface Service

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNetworkConnectorConfig, AbstractService, AssertionService, Atomikos, Config, ConfigurableService, ConnectorConfig, ContextConfig, DatabaseRealmService, DatabaseService, DatabaseTestUtilities, FireBugLoggerService, H2, HibernateService, HornetQ, HornetQServer, Hsqldb, InPlaceRealmService, Jersey, Jetty, JettyWebSocketContainerService, JMinix, JMX, JolokiaService, JpaService, JsonMessagesService, JtaService, LiquibaseService, LocalConnectorConfig, LogBack, Metrics, Perf4JService, PublishJmx, RealmService, RemoteWebServerService, RmiRegistry, ServerConnectorConfig, ServletContainer, ServletContextHandlerConfig, ShiroService, SpringData, TomcatService, TomcatWebSocketContainerService, TopLevelService, TransactionalService, WebAnnotationsService, WebDriverHelperService, WebDriverService, WebServerService, WebSocketContainerService

    @IndexSubclasses(storeJavadoc=true)
public interface Service
extends AutoCloseable
    Basic configurable component which can be configured, started and stopped.

    Services are instantiated by Services according to the provided configuration file. Most of the logic which configures the Service should be put in configure() method, so it can be lazily initialized by Guice which knows about dependencies between services.

    configure() is executed only once before creating Guice injector and can be used to configure it. close() is also executed only once, just before destroying the injector. start() and stop() methods should start and stop any functionality which this service provides to the outside world.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes this services, it won't be started again.
      com.google.inject.Module configure()
      Returns Module which specifies this service dependencies and what it provides to other services.
      String getId() 
      Iterable<? extends Service> getSubServices()
      Returns a list of direct sub-services this service contains.
      void start()
      Starts this service.
      void stop()
      Stops this service.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        String getId()

      • configure

        com.google.inject.Module configure()
        Returns Module which specifies this service dependencies and what it provides to other services.
        Returns:
        Guice module

      • start

        void start()
        Starts this service.

        All fields marked with Inject will be injected before execution of this method.

        Every functionality that is exported to other services should be started in configure() method or in registered Provider. Here you can start functionalities which are used outside this application.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops this service.

        Service can still be started later using start() method.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes this services, it won't be started again.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable

      • getSubServices

        @Nonnull
Iterable<? extends Service> getSubServices()
        Returns a list of direct sub-services this service contains.

        Although usually the list will come from unmarshalling the XML file, there is nothing which forbids the service from generating the list on the fly.

        Only direct sub-services should be returned. Moonshine will on its own ask returned sub-services for their sub-services.

        Returns:
        list of services
